languages.text: "Внимание! Во избежание рецидива мятежей все патрули планетарной стражи удваиваются распоряжением законного губернатора планеты. Все обнаруженные заговорщики и мятежники будут жестоко наказаны!"

traits.locale_text: "Внимание! Во избежание рецидива мятежей все патрули планетарной стражи удваиваются распоряжением законного губернатора планеты. Все обнаруженные заговорщики и мятежники будут жестоко наказаны!"

languages.text: "Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"
languages.original_text: "Внимание! Во избежание рецидива мятежей все патрули планетарной стражи удваиваются распоряжением законного губернатора планеты. Все обнаруженные заговорщики и мятежники будут жестоко наказаны!"

traits.locale_text: "Warning! To prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary warden patrols are doubled as ordered by the planet's lawful governor. All conspirators and instigators will receive severe punishment!"
"Warning! To prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary warden patrols are doubled as ordered by the planet's lawful governor. All conspirators and instigators will receive severe punishment!"
"Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled . All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"
"Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled . All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"
"Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"
"Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"

languages.text: "Achtung! Wie vom rechtmäßigen Gouverneur des Planeten angeordnet, werden zur Vermeidung weiterer Aufstände alle planetaren Wachpatrouillen verdoppelt. Alle Verschwörer und Aufwiegler werden hart bestraft!"
languages.original_text: "Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"

traits.locale_text: "Achtung! Wie vom rechtmäßigen Gouverneur des Planeten angeordnet, werden zur Vermeidung weiterer Aufstände alle planetaren Wachpatrouillen verdoppelt. Alle Verschwörer und Aufwiegler werden hart bestraft!"

languages.text: « Votre attention ! Par ordre du gouverneur élu de cette planète et afin d'empêcher les révoltes à répétition, les patrouilles vont être multipliées par deux. Les conspirateurs et les instigateurs seront tous sévèrement punis ! »
languages.original_text: "Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre attention ! Par ordre du gouverneur élu de cette planète et afin d'empêcher les révoltes à répétition, les patrouilles vont être multipliées par deux. Les conspirateurs et les instigateurs seront tous sévèrement punis ! »

languages.text: “所有人注意！奉行星总督当局命令，为了防止叛乱再次发生，行星防卫部队的所有巡逻队员都将增派两倍人手！所有阴谋分子与煽动者都将受到严惩！”
languages.original_text: "Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"

traits.locale_text: “所有人注意！奉行星总督当局命令，为了防止叛乱再次发生，行星防卫部队的所有巡逻队员都将增派两倍人手！所有阴谋分子与煽动者都将受到严惩！”

languages.text: 「注目せよ！惑星の正当なる総督の命令により、繰り返す反乱を防ぐべく、星の全警備パトロールが倍増される。陰謀者と扇動者は例外なく厳罰に処すされる！」
languages.original_text: "Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"

traits.locale_text: 「注目！惑星の正当なる総督の命令により、繰り返す反乱を防ぐべく、星の全警備パトロールが倍増される。陰謀者と扇動者は全員厳しく処罰される！」

languages.text: «¡Atención! Según órdenes del gobernador legítimo del planeta, para prevenir rebeliones recurrentes, todas las patrullas de la guardia planetaria se duplicarán. ¡Todos los conspiradores e instigadores recibirán un castigo severo!».
languages.original_text: "Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Atención! Según órdenes del gobernador legítimo del planeta, para prevenir rebeliones recurrentes, todas las patrullas de la guardia planetaria se duplicarán. ¡Todos los conspiradores e instigadores recibirán un castigo severo!».

languages.text: "Dikkat! Gezegenin meşru valisinin emriyle, ayaklanmaların önünü kesmek maksadıyla gezegen muhafızı devriyeleri iki katına çıkarılmıştır. İsyana ön ayak olanlar ve işbirlikçiler en ağır şekilde cezalandırılacaktır!"
languages.original_text: "Attention! As ordered by the planet's lawful governor, to prevent recurring rebellions, all planetary guard patrols are to be doubled. All conspirators and instigators will be harshly punished!"

traits.locale_text: "Dikkat! Gezegenin meşru valisinin emriyle, ayaklanmaların önünü kesmek maksadıyla gezegen muhafızı devriyeleri iki katına çıkarılmıştır. İsyana ön ayak olanlar ve işbirlikçiler en ağır şekilde cezalandırılacaktır!"
